reviews.review:
retarded competitive cooldowns. last time i was playing with my buddies I shot the retarded friend a bunch of times and got a 7 day ban... (because why tf wouldn't you shoot at a gorilla playing csgo) 
I got so angry I jumped in my chair and accidentaly cut myself right next to my butthole. I didn't really think of it and then after I took a dump I smeered some poop onto the wound and gave myself e. Coli.... I ended up in the ER with a 41.5 degree fever and an abcess the size of a tennis ball. Had to get a rectal exam from this really hot nurse who I decided to hit on. She deceived me for a bit with flirting before telling me she's gay, For fucks sake this day couldn't have gotten any worse I thought. 
But after some time in the hospital on strong antibiotics, morphine and me literally shitting vindaloo spicy diarrhoea at a rate of about 3 rectal eruptions an hour I finally got better and got home.
So I decided to relax by playing a game of csgo with my friend, since a week has passed I can play again.
It's been a great game we're winning and me and my friend are top 2 in the table. 
One player was trolling and griefing the game by literally knifing me at the round start so I got angry, reported him and shot him a bunch.
After a great round at the end of the game i accidentaly shot one guy from my team at the round end as a miss click. 
Result ?
7 day competitive cooldown.
